Name: Robo Runners
About the game: Welcome to Robo Runners! The world has become over populated and under fed. The solution? Run for your life. Robot AI has setup an arena to test contestants on their stamina and intelligence. If you manage to avoid the robots chasing you through the arena, you will be victorious. Fail to do so and your body will be liquefied, used as fuel for the robots. Ground and Air robots Upgrade your character Upgrade the opponents robots Player score board Group with your friends Saucy AI
